channel.title: CVE Feed for Cloud Foundry -- Routing
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Cloud Foundry -- Routing

item.title: CVE-2020-5420|2024-09-17T02:06:44.110Z -- cloud%20foundry -- routing
item.description: Cloud Foundry Routing (Gorouter) versions prior to 0.206.0 allow a malicious developer with "cf push" access to cause denial-of-service to the CF cluster by pushing an app that returns specially crafted HTTP responses that crash the Gorouters.
